content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace entity at position (0.0, 0.0) with a furnace source of copper ore and a furnace result of copper plates.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill entity at position (41.0, -82.0) with fuel source of coal.

### Wooden Chest at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest entity at position (40.5, -83.5) containing coal.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place.
- Make sure the required item is in the inventory before attempting to place.
- Ensure you have the required item to place in your inventory, for example, burner-mining-drill or wooden-chest.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.
- Ensure the required ingredients are in the inventory before attempting to craft an item.
- Ensure the recipe for the item exists and can be crafted with the available ingredients, for example, copper-cable requires copper-plate.
- Ensure the required amount of ingredients is available, for example, electronic-circuit requires 3 copper-cable.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the item to be inserted is in the inventory before attempting to insert.
- Ensure the entity is capable of accepting the item to be inserted.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Ensure the entity contains the item to be extracted before attempting to extract.
- Ensure the entity is a valid source for the item to be extracted, for example, furnace for copper-plate.

### Errors when using recipes
- Ensure all required ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to use a recipe.
- Ensure the recipe is enabled and has the required energy before attempting to use it.
- Ensure the recipe requires a crafting machine or smelting in a furnace, for example, copper-plate requires smelting in a furnace.

### Errors when checking entity positions
- Ensure the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to access or manipulate it.
- Ensure the position is correct and the entity is not at a different position, for example, burner-mining-drill at position (35.0, -101.0) instead of (41.0, -82.0).
